name: Retro Revenge Rebirth
description:
A young adult gets the revenge fantasy of her devilish dreams.

A spiritual successor to FAT ASS.  Made for the Outcast Interactive Novel Jam, an Unholy June entry.

This is a work of fiction, and doesn't necesarily reflect the author's views. 

I wrote this here & there while in recovery; I don't plan to advertise it yet, so if you're here, hi!  Let me know your thoughts on this in the comments.
